document_name: Decree no. 2007-291 (approving the statutes of the National Rural Electrification Agency)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/COG/2007/COG-2007-05-31-Decree no. 2007-291 (approving the statutes of the National Rural Electrification Agency)_a1d68a937db7494a8bfd6bfc4ae27a3d.pdf
document_description: This decree approves and specifies the statutes of the National Rural Electrification Agency, including its missions of promoting renewable energy sources and technologies favouring energy efficiency.
